message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $22,000 to start negotiations.
Hi Alice, thanks for offering! That price is a little high for me.  Would you consider $8,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $8,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down.  $18,000 is still a bit too much for my budget. Could we meet in the middle at $13,000?
